msbt.message: I hear you were really busy around here yesterday, !Let me know if you ever write a guide to getting the most out of a day, because I want to read it!
I hear you spent a lot of time fishing yesterday, !I'll bet you had a record haul after all that hard work, .
They're saying you caught an unreal number of bugs around the island yesterday, !What's your secret, ?
So are you out to set a new island beach-combing record? I heard you spent yesterday collecting shells Should I tell you if I see any rare shells on the beach, ?
I hear you did a bunch of clamming the other day, .I just so happen to have a great chowder recipe,
I hear you shot down lots of balloons yesterday, !I need you to teach me some of your slingshot techniques, .
Weren't all those shooting stars beautiful the other night?I heard you were wishing on them. Well, here's hoping all your wishes come true, !
I hear you were seen shaking trees all around here yesterday. Were you shaking out , ? Well, I hope you left a few for the rest of us
Was that you I heard chopping all that wood yesterday? Gathering up wood for a DIY project, maybe? You need to show me what you made if I guessed right, !
So, I heard that you cut down a lot of trees yesterday, I just hope you knew what you were doing. It'd be a shame to lose too many of our leafy friends.
I heard that you were really busy planting yesterday, I've always felt like planting is its own reward. It just feels good to dig in the soil and grow things!
Don't think I didn't hear about all the watering you did around here yesterday, Because I absolutely did, and I know all our greenery appreciated it too!
Was anything special going on with you yesterday? I heard you were being super expressive. I like when you show your feelings. It gets across that you care about what you have to say, .
I heard you worked on DIY projects all day yesterday. I'm impressed that you had enough supplies for that. Seems like it takes me forever to save up enough for any projects I want to try, .
Is it just me, or is everything you try to use breaking lately? Now my bug- catching net is starting to frayGuess I should probably DIY a new one for myself soon, .
I hear you stayed inside yesterday Was that because you were curled up with a good book, ? Because I'm always looking for new book recommendations, hint hint.
Nice to hear you're getting outside so much lately, .Maybe I just like the idea that I could run into you anywhere on the island, .
Um I heard you were out burying pitfall seeds, Don't worry, I won't tell anyone else what you were up to. I just hope no one gets hurt is all, .
Are you OK, ?I heard you kept falling into pits all day yesterday Here's hoping your luck improves, .
Is it true that you redecorated your place yesterday? I'm curious to see what it looks like now, !
So I hear you were busy on your phone every time anyone saw you yesterday, Oh, I know! I'll bet you were working on a custom design. Now I'm excited to see what you came up with!
It feels like we spent all day chatting yesterday, . That was a lot of fun, but, umWhat if I don't have anything fresh or new to say to you now?
I heard that you spent a lot of time chatting to yesterday, What were you two talking about?Sorry, that was rude of me to ask. It's really none of my business.
I hear you were a real social butterfly yesterday, !How do you always seem to know just what to say to everyone on our island, ?
I heard you were swarmed by angry wasps yesterday, I hope you heal up soon.
I heard what happened yesterday. Does your sting still hurt today, ? I hope not.You should really hive been more careful about shaking trees Sorry! I shouldn't joke while you're hurting.
I've been meaning to ask you about all the fossils I hear you dug up yesterday, .Have you had them assessed yet? It'd be so great if it turned out you found something rare.
Was that you that I heard hitting rocks yesterday over and over again, ? I hope you didn't break your shovel
So, is it true you were out burying money yesterday? I swear I wasn't spying on you, ! I just heard a rumor going around. Really none of my business.
I hear you harvested a lot of fruit yesterday, !Now you've got me imagining all the treats I might bake if I had all that fruit on hand, !
I hear you were busy with your phone whenever anyone else saw you yesterday, . I'm not the only one who's curious about what you were up to.
You were on your phone so much yesterday that some of us felt kind of left out, . You could always make up for that by making yourself more available to everyone today,
I was so impressed when I heard about all the hard work you did yesterday, !Don't act humble, now. I know you were building roads across the island all day, .
I couldn't believe it when I heard about all the work you did around here yesterday, !It must have taken forever to dig out those new waterways, .
You work hard, !I was amazed when I heard about all the earthmoving you were able to do around here yesterday, . Do you just like making new cliffs?
I hear you were a fencing machine yesterday, !They say good fences make good neighbors, so you must be the best neighbor we have, !
I heard about all your redecorating yesterday, !You have an eye for design balance, even when you're arranging furniture outside, .
Rumor is you're really racking up the miles, .It must feel great to look back at everything you've accomplished here. Good for you, !
Did you really pay off a loan yesterday, ?That's incredible! I'm happy for you. I can only hope I can manage to do the same someday,
You must have been on a shopping spree yesterday! I heard you visited Nook's Cranny a lot, . Here's hoping you found some good bargains there. I usually do.
I'm still humming that island tune you shared the other day. It's just that catchy, !
I was really impressed with your new flag design, !I might try sewing one for myself
I heard you put on a magic show yesterday, blipping into outfit after outfit with a wand, ! I bet you looked amazing doing it!
I heard about you jumping around the island with your vaulting pole yesterday, . That must've been fun, .
Your turnip buying is the talk of the island Everyone's asking, "What does know?" I'm no stalk-market expert, so I don't know what to make of your bold investment strategy. Hope it works out, !
Is it true that you just made a fortune selling your turnips?Could I maybe get you to give me stalk-market tips, ?
Everyone's still talking about how much YOU were talking yesterday.I know I love hearing the sound of your voice, so don't ever be afraid to speak your mind, .
Is it true that you tried to pull every last weed on the island yesterday, ? It's too bad they pop back up again so fast,
I heard you switched up your style yesterday, Wish I could be as bold as you are, .
Whoa! You've got a whole new look!I guess I don't always deal well with change,
I hear you were a real shutterbug yesterday, !Did your pictures come out right? I wouldn't mind seeing them if you want to share, .
